Package io.github.jy95.fds.r5.config

Class DefaultImplementationsR5

java.lang.Object
io.github.jy95.fds.r5.config.DefaultImplementationsR5
public final class DefaultImplementationsR5 extends Object
Provides FHIR R5 implementations for common operations in the library.
Author:
jy95

    • selectDosageAndRateField

      public static org.hl7.fhir.r5.model.DataType selectDosageAndRateField(List<org.hl7.fhir.r5.model.Dosage.DosageDoseAndRateComponent> doseAndRateComponentList, DoseAndRateKey doseAndRateKey)
      Selects a specific dosage and rate field from a list of Dosage.DosageDoseAndRateComponent.
      Parameters:
      doseAndRateComponentList - the list of dosage components.
      doseAndRateKey - the key used to extract the specific field.
      Returns:
      the extracted DataType value.

    • hasMatchingComponent

      public static boolean hasMatchingComponent(org.hl7.fhir.r5.model.Dosage dosage, Predicate<org.hl7.fhir.r5.model.Dosage.DosageDoseAndRateComponent> predicate)
      Checks if a Dosage has any component matching a given predicate.
      Parameters:
      dosage - the Dosage to check.
      predicate - the predicate to apply to each component.
      Returns:
      true if any component matches the predicate; false otherwise.
